4318770.name: Somebody's Ramyeon Shop
4318770.description:
[The Ultimate K-Ramyeon Part-Time Experience]

Experience the high-tension environment of an authentic Korean Ramyeon shop in full 3D. As the new part-timer, you are in charge of the entire kitchen. Use your skills to manage multiple pots, follow recipes precisely, and maximize your income. How much you earn today will change your future!

[Key Features]

  • Intuitive Controls: Move through the kitchen using WASD, control your view with the mouse, and interact with various items using the 'E' key. Simple controls, but mastering the rush is the real challenge!

  • Master the Recipe: Precision is key. Balance the water levels and add ingredients in the right order to satisfy picky customers and earn higher tips.

  • High-Speed Multitasking: The orders never stop. You’ll need to juggle boiling pots, refilling kettles, and prepping toppings all at once. One second of hesitation could lead to a burnt mess!

  • Income-Based Multi-Endings: Your total revenue at the end of the shift dictates the ending you receive. Will you become the "Legendary Manager" or face an "Early Termination"?

  • The Completionist’s Challenge: To see every ending, you must push your speed to the absolute limit. Only the most frantic and flawless playstyles will reveal the true "Final Ending."

[Can You Handle the Heat?]

In this shop, time is literally money. Every bowl you serve brings you closer to a different destiny. Sharpen your senses, move your hands faster than the eye can see, and conquer the ultimate Ramyeon challenge!
